mapper.select: SELECT A.school_id, A.school_name, A.university_code, B.university_name, A.contacts, A.cellphone, A.data_status, CASE WHEN A.data_status = 'A' THEN '正常' WHEN A.data_status = 'D' THEN '冻结' ELSE '未知数据状态' END AS data_status_text, C.admin_name AS create_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, D.admin_name AS update_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_time FROM shangshufang_customer.school A INNER JOIN shangshufang_customer.university B ON A.university_code = B.university_code INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.system_admin C ON A.create_user = C.admin_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.system_admin D ON A.update_user = D.admin_id WHERE A.university_code = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.school_id = #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER};
SELECT COUNT(1) AS TotalCount FROM shangshufang_customer.school WHERE cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shangshufang_customer.school ( school_name, university_code, contacts, cellphone, create_user, update_user ) VALUES ( #{schoolName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{universityCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contacts, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cellphone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
